reviewText:
A must for fans of old-school action films with memorable characters and plenty of cool scenes!
Reminded me of the action films they used to make. An entertaining watch!

First, I know of Alki David from FilmOn and Battlecam.com. I think he's a very entertaining guy. I see great casting for this film. Based just on the cast, I rate it 5 STARS!!! But the story line sounds great too!  Can't wait to see this movie.

http://www.amazon.com/Guido-Gary-Busey/dp/B00BO82I7U/ref=sr_1_1?s=movies-tv&ie=UTF8&qid=1368426434&sr=1-1&keywords=guido
THIS MOVIE IS A MUST SEE! I BELIEVE IT WILL GET AN OSCAR. THIS IS ALKI DAVID'S BEST WORK SINCE 'THE BANK JOB.'  ALKI PLAYS THE PART OF 'GUIDO' REMARKABLY WELL.  I GIVE THIS MOVIE A 'THUMBS UP'.
